class.name: ParameterizedODE

javadoc.text: Interface to compute by finite difference Jacobian matrix for some parameter * when computing {@link JacobianMatrices partial derivatives equations}.
Get parameter value from its name.
javadoc.exception: UnknownParameterException if parameter is not supported

javadoc.text: Set the value for a given parameter.
javadoc.exception: UnknownParameterException if parameter is not supported
